openlca_ui_steps: Process view → exchange 'polyethylene film' → Choose flow → search 'LDPE' or 'polyethylene film' → Select packaging-grade LDPE film process
recommendation: Prefer ELCD film process; paste process code into brightway_premap_results.csv

openlca_ui_steps: Process view → exchange 'polyethylene terephthalate' → Choose flow → search 'PET' or 'polyethylene terephthalate' → Select PET granulate or PET bottle production
recommendation: If specific PET bottle process exists, use it; else use PET granulate

unit_conversion_note: Process view → exchange 'clean water' → Choose flow → search 'water, treated' or 'water distribution' → select municipal treated water process
recommendation: L m3: use per m3 processes and scale to L (1 m3 = 1000 L)
column6: Use treated water + distribution; document proxy if Nigeria not available

recommendation: Process view → exchange 'electricity' → Choose flow → search 'electricity, medium voltage' or 'grid mix' → select nearest regional grid
column7: Use West Africa/Nigeria proxy; run sensitivity with alternate grid mixes

column6: Process view → exchange 'truck transport' → Choose flow → search 'transport, freight, lorry' → pick suitable weight class process
column7: Convert mass (kg) to t: kg/1000 then multiply by km to get tkm
column8: If only per-km process exists, compute tkm externally and enter tkm amount

recommendation: Process view → exchange 'disposal landfill' → Choose flow → search 'disposal, landfill' → pick municipal landfill process
column7: Prefer uncontrolled/municipal landfill for Lagos context; document choice

openlca_ui_steps: Process view → exchange 'open burn' → Choose flow → search 'open burning' or 'open burning of waste' → select uncontrolled open burn process
recommendation: High uncertainty; document and vary in sensitivity

unit_conversion_note: Process view → exchange 'sachet recycled' → Choose flow → search 'recycling polyethylene' or 'recycling film' → select appropriate recycling process
column6: If closed-loop recycling process not available, model avoided burden conservatively

unit_conversion_note: Process view → exchange 'pet recycled' → Choose flow → search 'recycling PET' or 'recycling beverage bottles' → select PET bottle recycling
column6: Use beverage-bottle recycling process and recovery rate

unit_conversion_note: Process view → exchange 'printing inks' → Choose flow → search 'printing inks, packaging' → select inks process
column6: Include if labels/printing significant; otherwise omit

openlca_ui_steps: Process view → exchange 'blow moulding' → Choose flow → search 'blow moulding' or 'bottle forming' → select blow moulding process
unit_conversion_note: kWh per bottle — convert to per FU
recommendation: Include energy per bottle operation; scale to per-L FU

unit_conversion_note: Process view → exchange 'water_treatment_kWh' → Choose flow → search 'water treatment, conventional' → select per m3 treatment process
recommendation: if process per m3, divide by 1000 to per L
column6: Include chemical and energetic treatment processes as available
